oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Angular dependence of the exchange interaction in fluoride-bridged Gd-III-Cr-III complexes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SINGH, SK
PEDERSEN, KS
SIGRIST, M
THUESEN, CA
SCHAU-MAGNUSSEN, M

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: MAGNETIC-PROPERTIES
CLUSTER

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The observed angular variation of the magnetic exchange coupling parameter in a series of fluoride-bridged chromium(III)-gadolinium(III) complexes is explained by DFT calculations.
